title: Gymnastics and Me
description: This is the perfect gift for the budding gymnast in your life.This childrens book has rhyming poems about why gymnastics is such a lovable sport.It touches on making friends, building a strong body, performing in shows and growing confidence.It is suitable for ages as young as 3 and as advanced as 9.Show your little gymnast how much you support them! Brilliant gift for all occasions.
author: Jessica Dawn Birks
